rdf:Description.lla:note: Official Log notes Thomas Marsh deserted taking with him all his clothes
Official Log notes John Ratter deserted taking with him all his clothes

Accompanying notes show that David Evans, Master, paid the sum of Â£9,9,0 on behalf of the crew for indemnity to two Spanish Lightermen wounded by the crew on 1872-05-18 for doctor's fees and legal expenses.
Ship's Agreement and Log Book also accompanied by Certificate of Discharge for Fergus Forrester
Ship's Agreement and Log Book also accompanied by Certificate of Discharge for Thomas Evans
Ship's Agreement and Log Book also accompanied by Certificate of Discharge for Peter A Hoyer
